group_1.textCenter: I was really trying my best, but...

group_1.textRight: You're getting the hang of it so quickly, Chiharu!@Especially for a beginner.

group_1.textLeft: Aw, well...!

group_1.textRight: Hoho, you're a very reliable Diviner.

group_1.textCenter: (Feeling like I was being useful...made me really@happy...)
...I guess there's no point in moping around.
(Sometimes it's not enough to just want to help...)
(I'm still young, so I don't get everything that's going@on with the grown-ups...)
(When I grow up, I need to become someone who's smart and really skilled...)

group_1.textRight: I'm home!
What was with the long face just then, Charu?@What happened to your energy?

group_1.textLeft: I was just thinking...

group_1.textRight: ...Was it about what I said this morning?

group_1.textLeft: Uh...yeah, sort of...

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry. I didn't mean to upset you.
I was going to ask you to help me once things settle@down with the village.
But there are still many problems that I and@the other adults need to take care of right now.

group_1.textLeft: So when do you think everything will get resolved?

group_1.textRight: Well...
I wish I could say it'd be soon, but it's not that easy.
If we run out of money, we won't be able to sustain@the village.
We need to convince the villagers to go out and@find work...

group_1.textLeft: They have to go outside of the village?@Hmm...

group_1.textRight: Would that be too hard for you?

group_1.textLeft: Mmmph...

group_1.textRight: Well, if you're frustrated, don't just sit around@watching dramas. Study hard!

group_1.textLeft: But dramas are valuable tools for understanding@modern-day life!
The problems that the shogun faced can help us@solve the ones we're having now.

group_1.textRight: Huh?
The shogun...? Ah, you mean the one from that@period drama you love so much.

group_1.textLeft: Exactly. He even helped save poor villages like ours.
He would discover the appeal of each village and@figure out how to capitalize on it...
[chara:102601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Hm?!
Th-that's it...!@I-I think I got it!

group_1.textRight: Wh-what's wrong?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102601:effect_shake]If we can figure out this village's selling points,@just like the shogun did...
[chara:102601:effect_shake]...then maybe we can help everyone!

group_1.textRight: Now I see what you're talking about.@But please stop shaking around like that...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock][chara:102601:effect_shake]Huh?!
[chara:102601:effect_shake]I feel itchy, just like the shogun does!

group_1.textRight: Ah, I see...when the shogun can't resist the urge@to help someone,
He gets an itch and his whole body starts shaking,@doesn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
All right...I know what I'm supposed to do now.
Thank you, shogun!

group_1.textRight: Hey, Charu! Where are you going?@What about dinner?!

group_1.textLeft: I'll eat mine lateeerâ€”!

group_1.textRight: Just like that, she's gone...
